greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 1/23.
comment: Since 23 is prime and the cycle of its reciprocal's base 10 digits is 22, 23 is a full reptend prime in base 10 (A001913). - _Alonso del Arte_, Mar 26 2020
program: (Scala) def longDivRecip(n: Int, places: Int = 100): List[Int] = {
remainder = quotient % n; quotient /= n; digits += quotient
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
